Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item is not just a purchase; it's an investment in quality and convenience. Given its high value and unique features, I believe it would significantly enhance your daily experience. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $180. This opportunity won't last long, so I encourage you to consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. I look forward to the possibility of providing you with this outstanding product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
